docs.title: Welcome to MkDocs
docs.text: For full documentation visit mkdocs.org.

docs.title: Commands
docs.text:
• mkdocs new [dir-name] - Create a new project.
  • mkdocs serve - Start the live-reloading docs server.
  • mkdocs build - Build the documentation site.
  • mkdocs -h - Print help message and exit.

docs.title: Project layout
docs.text:
mkdocs.yml    # The configuration file.
docs/
    index.md  # The documentation homepage.
    ...       # Other markdown pages, images and other files.

docs.title: A
docs.text:
两种情况

1.\(1\sim 1,2\sim n\)

2.\(1\sim n-1,n\sim n\)

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
// #define endl '\n'
#define fi first
#define se second
using namespace std;
using ll = long long;
using pll = pair<ll, ll>;
using db = long double;
const int N = 4e6 + 100;
const db pi = acos(-1);
const ll mod = 998244353;
using pii = pair<int, int>;
void solve()
{
    int n;
    cin >> n;
    vector<int> a(n + 1);
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
        cin >> a[i];
    if (a[1] == a[n])
        cout << "NO" << endl;
    else
    {
        cout << "YES" << endl;
        int l = 2, r = n;
        if (a[2] == a[n])
            l = n;
        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
            if (i >= l && i <= r)
                cout << 'B';
            else
                cout << 'R';
        cout << endl;
    }
}
int main()
{
#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("in.txt", "r", stdin);
    freopen("out.txt", "w", stdout);
#endif
    // cout << setprecision(10) << endl;
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0);
    int _ = 1;
    cin >> _;
    while (_--)
        solve();
    return 0;
}

docs.title: B
docs.text:
可以暴力枚举所有情况,发现尾数只能为\(0\sim8\)

1.最低位不能为\(9\)

因为是位数相同,且每一位一定会进位

2.最高位一定是1

中间的其他一定是\(1+x+y \mod 10,x,y\in [5,9]\)

值域为\(1\sim 9\)

3.中间的其他位不能为0

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define endl '\n'
#define fi first
#define se second
using namespace std;
using ll = long long;
using pll = pair<ll, ll>;
using db = long double;
const int N = 4e6 + 100;
const db pi = acos(-1);
const ll mod = 998244353;
using pii = pair<int, int>;
void solve()
{
    string s;
    cin >> s;
    for (int i = 1; i < (int)s.size() - 1; i++)
        if (s[i] == '0')
        {
            cout << "NO" << endl;
            return;
        }
    if (*s.begin() == '1' && *s.rbegin() != '9')
        cout << "YES" << endl;
    else
        cout << "NO" << endl;
}
int main()
{
#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("in.txt", "r", stdin);
    freopen("out.txt", "w", stdout);
#endif
    // cout << setprecision(10) << endl;
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0);
    int _ = 1;
    cin >> _;
    while (_--)
        solve();
    return 0;
}

docs.title: C1
docs.text:
简单\(dp\)

\(f_{i,0/1}\)表示前\(i\)个数能得到的最小值/最大值

转移显然

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define endl '\n'
#define fi first
#define se second
using namespace std;
using ll = long long;
using pll = pair<ll, ll>;
using db = long double;
const int N = 4e6 + 100;
const db pi = acos(-1);
const ll mod = 998244353;
using pii = pair<int, int>;
void solve()
{
    int n;
    cin >> n;
    vector<ll> a(n + 1);
    vector<vector<ll>> f(n + 1, vector<ll>(2, 0));
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
    {
        cin >> a[i];
        f[i][0] = 1e18, f[i][1] = -1e18;
    }
    f[1][0] = a[1];
    f[1][1] = abs(a[1]);
    for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++)
    {
        f[i][0] = min(f[i][0], f[i - 1][0] + a[i]);
        f[i][1] = max({f[i][1], f[i - 1][1] + a[i], abs(f[i - 1][0] + a[i])});
    }
    cout << f[n][1] << endl;
}
int main()
{
#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("in.txt", "r", stdin);
    freopen("out.txt", "w", stdout);
#endif
    // cout << setprecision(10) << endl;
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0);
    int _ = 1;
    cin >> _;
    while (_--)
        solve();
    return 0;
}

docs.title: C2
docs.text:
思路类似\(c_1\)

但是要注意可能会出现\(max,min\)相等的情况,这种情况要把\(min\) 置成\(0\)

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define endl '\n'
#define x first
#define y second
using namespace std;
using ll = long long;
using pll = pair<ll, ll>;
using db = long double;
const int N = 4e6 + 100;
const db pi = acos(-1);
const ll mod = 998244353;
using pll = pair<ll, ll>;
void solve()
{
    int n;
    cin >> n;
    vector<ll> a(n + 1);
    vector<vector<pll>> f(n + 1, vector<pll>(2, pll(0, 0)));
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
    {
        cin >> a[i];
        f[i][0] = {1e18, 0}, f[i][1] = {-1e18, 0};
    }
    if (a[1] >= 0)
    {
        f[1][0] = {a[1], 0};
        f[1][1] = {abs(a[1]), 2};
    }
    else
    {
        f[1][0] = {a[1], 1};
        f[1][1] = {abs(a[1]), 1};
    }
    for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++)
    {

        // min
        // dp val
        f[i][0].x = min(f[i][0].x, f[i - 1][0].x + a[i]);
        // dp way
        if (f[i - 1][0].x + a[i] == f[i][0].x)
            f[i][0].y = (f[i][0].y + f[i - 1][0].y) % mod;
        if (abs(f[i - 1][0].x + a[i]) == f[i][0].x)
            f[i][0].y = (f[i][0].y + f[i - 1][0].y) % mod;

        if (f[i - 1][1].x + a[i] == f[i][0].x)
            f[i][0].y = (f[i][0].y + f[i - 1][1].y) % mod;

        if (abs(f[i - 1][1].x + a[i]) == f[i][0].x)
            f[i][0].y = (f[i][0].y + f[i - 1][1].y) % mod;

        // max
        // dp val
        f[i][1].x = max({f[i][1].x, f[i - 1][1].x + a[i], abs(f[i - 1][0].x + a[i])});
        // dp way
        if (f[i - 1][0].x + a[i] == f[i][1].x)
            f[i][1].y = (f[i][1].y + f[i - 1][0].y) % mod;

        if (abs(f[i - 1][0].x + a[i]) == f[i][1].x)
            f[i][1].y = (f[i][1].y + f[i - 1][0].y) % mod;

        if (f[i - 1][1].x + a[i] == f[i][1].x)
            f[i][1].y = (f[i][1].y + f[i - 1][1].y) % mod;

        if (abs(f[i - 1][1].x + a[i]) == f[i][1].x)
            f[i][1].y = (f[i][1].y + f[i - 1][1].y) % mod;

        if (f[i][0].x == f[i][1].x)
            f[i][0].y = 0;
    }
    cout << f[n][1].y << endl;
}
int main()
{
#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("in.txt", "r", stdin);
    freopen("out.txt", "w", stdout);
#endif
    // cout << setprecision(10) << endl;
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0);
    int _ = 1;
    cin >> _;
    while (_--)
        solve();
    return 0;
}

docs.title: A.Guess the Maximum
docs.text:
答案就是所有能取到的最大值中的最小值 

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define endl '\n'
using namespace std;
using ll = long long;
const ll mod = 998244353;
void solve() {
    int n;
    cin >> n;
    vector<int> a(n + 1);
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
        cin >> a[i];
    int ans = INT_MAX;
    for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++)
        ans = min(ans, max(a[i - 1], a[i]));
    cout << ans - 1 << endl;
}
int main() {
#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("in.txt", "r", stdin);
    freopen("out.txt", "w", stdout);
#endif
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0);
    int _ = 1;
    cin >> _;
    while (_--)
        solve();
    return 0;
}

docs.title: B.XOR Sequences
docs.text:
要使得\(i \oplus x=j\oplus y\),就一定要满足,相同的位置,要么同时改变,要么同时不变

一个显然的解是 \(i=y,j=x\)

那么,将后缀所有相同位都置0,显然也是可以的

所以答案就是二进制位中相同后缀的长度 

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define endl '\n'
using namespace std;
using ll = long long;
const ll mod = 998244353;
void solve() {
    ll x, y;
    cin >> x >> y;
    for (int i = 0; i <= 30; i++) {
        int u = (x >> i) & 1;
        int v = (y >> i) & 1;
        if (u != v) {
            cout << (1 << i) << endl;
            return;
        }
    }
}
int main() {
#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("in.txt", "r", stdin);
    freopen("out.txt", "w", stdout);
#endif
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0);
    int _ = 1;
    cin >> _;
    while (_--)
        solve();
    return 0;
}

docs.title: C.Earning on Bets
docs.text:
设总投资为\(S\),则要求转化为

\(\sum \frac{S}{k_i} < S\)

约掉\(S\)

\(\sum \frac{1}{k_i} < 1\)

用lcm通分check即可 

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define endl '\n'
using namespace std;
using ll = long long;
const ll mod = 998244353;
void solve() {
    ll n;
    cin >> n;
    vector<ll> k(n + 1), ans(n + 1, 0);
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
        cin >> k[i];
    ll res = 1;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
        res = lcm(res, k[i]);
    ll sum = 0;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
        ans[i] = res / k[i], sum += ans[i];
    if (sum >= res)
        cout << "-1" << endl;
    else {
        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
            cout << ans[i] << " ";
        cout << endl;
    }
}
int main() {
#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("in.txt", "r", stdin);
    freopen("out.txt", "w", stdout);
#endif
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0);
    int _ = 1;
    cin >> _;
    while (_--)
        solve();
    return 0;
}

docs.title: A 配对质数
docs.text:
考虑从小到大递推,如果新的一对不合法,就再往前调整

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define endl '\n'
#define fi first
#define se second
using namespace std;
using ll = long long;
using pii = pair<int, int>;
const int N = 4e6 + 100;
vector<int> notpr(N), pr;
void solve() {
    int n;
    cin >> n;
    vector<pii> ans;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        int u = 2 * i - 1, v = 2 * i;

        if (notpr[u + v]) {
            for (int j = (int)ans.size() - 1; j >= 0; j--) {
                if (!notpr[ans[j].fi + u] && !notpr[ans[j].se + v]) {
                    swap(ans[j].fi, v);
                    break;
                }
                if (!notpr[ans[j].se + u] && !notpr[ans[j].fi + v]) {
                    swap(ans[j].se, v);
                    break;
                }
            }
        }
        ans.push_back({u, v});
    }
    for (auto [x, y] : ans)
        cout << x << " " << y << endl;
}
int main() {
#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("in.txt", "r", stdin);
    freopen("out.txt", "w", stdout);
#endif

    for (int i = 2; i <= 4000000; i++) {
        if (!notpr[i])
            pr.push_back(i);
        for (auto &p : pr) {
            if (i * p > 4000000)
                break;
            notpr[i * p] = 1;
            if (i % p == 0)
                break;
        }
    }
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0);
    int _ = 1;
    cin >> _;
    while (_--)
        solve();
    return 0;
}

docs.title: B 问路
docs.text:
弧长公式:\(L=\alpha \times r\)

注意考虑往北后,可能会绕圈,需要对新的周长取模

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define endl '\n'
#define fi first
#define se second
using namespace std;
using ll = long long;
using pii = pair<int, int>;
using db = long double;
const int N = 4e6 + 100;
const db pi = acos(-1);
void solve() {
    // Point a(0, 0, 0), b(0, 0, 0);
    db x, r;
    cin >> r >> x;
    db ang1 = x / r;       // 第一次走的角度(弧度制)
    db r1 = r * cos(ang1); // 新平面的半径
    db l = 2 * pi * r1;

    int L = 0, R = 1e9;
    while (L < R) {
        int mid = (L + R + 1) >> 1;
        if (l * mid <= x)
            L = mid;
        else
            R = mid - 1;
    }
    db mod = x - l * L;
    db ang2 = mod / r1;
    db nlen = r * ang2;
    nlen -= x;
    cout << min(nlen, 2 * pi * r - nlen) << endl;
}
int main() {
#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("in.txt", "r", stdin);
    freopen("out.txt", "w", stdout);
#endif
    cout << setprecision(10) << endl;
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0);
    int _ = 1;
    //   cin >> _;
    while (_--)
        solve();
    return 0;
}

docs.title: C 大魔法师
docs.text:
简单dp

定义\(f_i\)为使用\(i\)个孔洞分别能得到的最大值,然后再进行两次背包即可

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define endl '\n'
#define fi first
#define se second
using namespace std;
using ll = long long;
using pii = pair<int, int>;
const int N = 4e6 + 100;
vector<int> notpr(N), pr;
void solve() {
    int n, m1, m2, m3;
    cin >> n >> m1 >> m2 >> m3;
    vector<ll> f1(n + 10, 0), f2(n + 10, 0), f(n + 10, 0);
    while (m1--) {
        int u, v;
        cin >> u >> v;
        for (int i = n - u; i >= 0; i--)
            f1[i + u] = max(f1[i + u], f1[i] + v);
    }
    while (m2--) {
        int u, v;
        cin >> u >> v;
        for (int i = n - u; i >= 0; i--)
            f2[i + u] = max(f2[i + u], f2[i] + v);
    }
    for (int i = 0; i <= n; i++)
        for (int j = 0; i + j <= n; j++)
            f[i + j] = max(f[i + j], f1[i] * f2[j]);
    for (int i = 0; i <= n; i++)
        f1[i] = 0, f2[i] = 0;
    while (m3--) {
        int u, v;
        cin >> u >> v;
        for (int i = n - u; i >= 0; i--)
            f1[i + u] = max(f1[i + u], f1[i] + v);
    }

    for (int i = 0; i <= n; i++)
        for (int j = 0; i + j <= n; j++)
            f2[i + j] = max(f2[i + j], f[i] * f1[j]);
    ll ans = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i <= n; i++)
        ans = max(ans, f2[i]);
    cout << ans << endl;

}
int main() {
#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("in.txt", "r", stdin);
    freopen("out.txt", "w", stdout);
#endif
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0);
    int _ = 1;
    // cin >> _;
    while (_--)
        solve();
    return 0;
}

docs.title: E 魔方
docs.text:
模拟题

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define endl '\n'
#define fi first
#define se second
using namespace std;
using ll = long long;
using pii = pair<int, int>;
using db = long double;
const int N = 4e6 + 100;
const db pi = acos(-1);
void solve() {
    string s;
    cin >> s;

    vector<int> a(30, 0);
    for (int i = 1; i <= 24; i++)
        a[i] = i / 4 - (i % 4 == 0);

    auto L = [&]() -> void {
        int t = a[5];
        a[5] = a[6], a[6] = a[8], a[8] = a[7], a[7] = t;

        int u = a[1],
            v = a[3];
        a[1] = a[9], a[3] = a[11];
        a[9] = a[17], a[11] = a[19];
        a[17] = a[21], a[19] = a[23];
        a[21] = u, a[23] = v;
    };
    auto R = [&]() -> void {
        int t = a[13];
        a[13] = a[15], a[15] = a[16], a[16] = a[14], a[14] = t;

        int u = a[2], v = a[4];
        a[2] = a[10], a[4] = a[12];
        a[10] = a[18], a[12] = a[20];
        a[18] = a[22], a[20] = a[24];
        a[22] = u, a[24] = v;
    };
    auto U = [&]() -> void {
        int t = a[1];
        a[1] = a[3], a[3] = a[4], a[4] = a[2], a[2] = t;

        int u = a[5], v = a[6];
        a[5] = a[9], a[6] = a[10];
        a[9] = a[13], a[10] = a[14];
        a[13] = a[24], a[14] = a[23];
        a[24] = u, a[23] = v;
    };
    auto D = [&]() -> void {
        int t = a[17];
        a[17] = a[18], a[18] = a[20], a[20] = a[19], a[19] = t;

        int u = a[7], v = a[8];
        a[7] = a[11], a[8] = a[12];
        a[11] = a[15], a[12] = a[16];
        a[15] = a[22], a[16] = a[21];
        a[22] = u, a[21] = v;
    };
    auto F = [&]() -> void {
        int t = a[9];
        a[9] = a[11], a[11] = a[12], a[12] = a[10], a[10] = t;

        int u = a[3], v = a[4];
        a[3] = a[8], a[4] = a[6];
        a[8] = a[18], a[6] = a[17];
        a[18] = a[13], a[17] = a[15];
        a[13] = u, a[15] = v;
    };
    auto B = [&]() -> void {
        int t = a[23];
        a[23] = a[22], a[22] = a[21], a[21] = a[24], a[24] = t;

        int u = a[1], v = a[2];
        a[1] = a[14], a[2] = a[16];
        a[14] = a[20], a[16] = a[19];
        a[20] = a[7], a[19] = a[5];
        a[7] = u, a[5] = v;
    };

    reverse(s.begin(), s.end());
    while (s.size()) {
        int opt = 0;
        auto c = s.back();
        s.pop_back();
        if (s.back() == 39)
            opt += 3, s.pop_back();
        else
            opt++;
        if (s.back() == '2')
            opt *= 2, s.pop_back();
        for (int i = 1; i <= opt; i++) {
            if (c == 'B')
                B();
            if (c == 'F')
                F();
            if (c == 'L')
                L();
            if (c == 'R')
                R();
            if (c == 'U')
                U();
            if (c == 'D')
                D();
        }
    }
    for (int i = 1; i <= 24; i += 4) {
        set<int> s;
        for (int j = i; j <= i + 3; j++)
            s.insert(a[j]);
        if (s.size() != 1) {
            cout << "NO" << endl;
            return;
        }
    }
    cout << "YES" << endl;
}
int main() {
#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("in.txt", "r", stdin);
    freopen("out.txt", "w", stdout);
#endif
    // cout << setprecision(10) << endl;
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0);
    int _ = 1;
    cin >> _;
    while (_--)
        solve();
    return 0;
}

docs.title: F 溶液配制 Ⅰ
docs.text:
对于一种集合方案,它能得到浓度为\(min\sim max\)

所以转换为求多少种方案,\(min<=x,max>=x\)

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define endl '\n'
#define fi first
#define se second
using namespace std;
using ll = long long;
using pii = pair<int, int>;
using db = long double;
const int N = 4e6 + 100;
const db pi = acos(-1);
const ll mod = 1e9 + 7;
void solve() {
    map<ll, ll> mp;
    auto qmi = [&](ll a, ll b) -> ll {
        ll res = 1;
        while (b) {
            if (b & 1)
                res = res * a % mod;
            b >>= 1;
            a = a * a % mod;
        }
        return res;
    };
    int n, q;
    cin >> n >> q;
    vector<ll> a(n + 1, 0);
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        string s;
        cin >> s;
        for (auto &c : s)
            if (c <= '9' && c >= '0')
                a[i] = a[i] * 10 + c - '0';
        mp[a[i]]++;
    }

    sort(a.begin() + 1, a.end());

    for (int i = 1; i <= q; i++) {
        string s;
        cin >> s;
        ll tar = 0;
        for (auto &c : s)
            if (c <= '9' && c >= '0')
                tar = tar * 10 + c - '0';

        ll pos = lower_bound(a.begin() + 1, a.end(), tar) - a.begin();
        ll num = n - pos + 1;
        ll big = num - mp[tar];

        ll fnum = (qmi(2, num) - 1 + mod) % mod;
        ll fs = (qmi(2, pos - 1) - 1 + mod) % mod;
        ll ans = fnum * fs % mod; // 大+小

        ll equ = (qmi(2, mp[tar]) - 1 + mod) % mod;
        ll oth = qmi(2, big);
        ans = (ans + (equ * oth) % mod) % mod;
        cout << ans << endl;
    }
}
int main() {
#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("in.txt", "r", stdin);
    freopen("out.txt", "w", stdout);
#endif
    // cout << setprecision(10) << endl;
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0);
    int _ = 1;
    // cin >> _;
    while (_--)
        solve();
    return 0;
}

docs.title: I Mai 语言
docs.text:
首先想到构造尽可能大的\(k\),一定是\(x\)从小到大,如果最大的\(k\),都不能满足,输出\(-1\)

另外还要考虑\(m\)的限制

特判一下\(n=1,k=1\)

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define endl '\n'
#define fi first
#define se second
using namespace std;
using ll = long long;
using pll = pair<ll, ll>;
using db = long double;
const int N = 4e6 + 100;
const db pi = acos(-1);
const ll mod = 998244353;
using pii = pair<int, int>;
void solve() {
    auto len = [&](int x) -> int {
        int res = 0;
        while (x)
            x /= 10, res++;
        return res + 2;
    };
    auto print = [&](int x, int k) -> void {
        cout << "{" << (1 << x) << "}";
        for (int i = 1; i <= k; i++)
            cout << ',';
        cout << endl;
    };
    int n, m, k;
    cin >> n >> m >> k;
    vector<int> ans(n + 10, 0);
    if (n == 1) {
        if (m - 3 >= k)
            print(0, k);
        else
            cout << "-1" << endl;
        return;
    }
    if (k == 1) {
        if (len(1 << n) + 2 > m)
            cout << "-1" << endl;
        else
            for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
                print(i, 2 - (i != n));
        return;
    }

    k *= (1 << n - 1);
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++) {
        int u = (1 << (n - 1 - i));
        if (k) {
            int sub = min(k / u, m - len(1 << i));
            ans[i] += sub, k -= sub * u;
        } else {
            if (ans[i - 1] > 1)
                ans[i - 1]--, ans[i] += 2;
            else {
                cout << "-1" << endl;
                return;
            }
        }
    }
    if (k) {
        cout << "-1" << endl;
        return;
    }
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
        if (len(1 << i) + ans[i] > m) {
            cout << "-1" << endl;
            return;
        }
    for (int i = 0; i < n; i++)
        print(i, ans[i]);
}
int main() {
#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("in.txt", "r", stdin);
    freopen("out.txt", "w", stdout);
#endif
    // cout << setprecision(10) << endl;
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0);
    int _ = 1;
    // cin >> _;
    while (_--)
        solve();
    return 0;
}

docs.title: L 道路
docs.text:
贪心,每次走距离最小的叶子

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define endl '\n'
#define fi first
#define se second
using namespace std;
using ll = long long;
using pll = pair<ll, ll>;
using db = long double;
const int N = 4e6 + 100;
const db pi = acos(-1);
const ll mod = 998244353;
using pii = pair<int, int>;
void solve() {
    int n;
    cin >> n;
    vector<vector<int>> e(n + 1);
    vector<int> dist(n + 1, 0), f(n + 1, 0), vis(n + 1, 0);
    for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++) {
        cin >> f[i];
        e[f[i]].push_back(i);
    }
    auto dfs = [&](auto &dfs, int u, int fa) -> void {
        for (auto &to : e[u])
            if (to != fa) {
                dist[to] = dist[u] + 1;
                dfs(dfs, to, u);
            }
    };
    dfs(dfs, 1, 0);
    int mi = 1e9, mx = 0;
    vector<pii> leaf;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
        if (e[i].empty())
            leaf.push_back({dist[i], i});
    sort(leaf.begin(), leaf.end(), greater<pii>());
    vis[1] = 1;
    while (leaf.size()) {
        auto [dis, t] = leaf.back();
        leaf.pop_back();
        int res = 0;
        while (!vis[t]) {
            res++;
            vis[t] = 1;
            t = f[t];
        }
        mi = min(mi, res), mx = max(mx, res);
    }
    cout << mx - mi << endl;
}
int main() {
#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
    freopen("in.txt", "r", stdin);
    freopen("out.txt", "w", stdout);
#endif
    // cout << setprecision(10) << endl;
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0);
    int _ = 1;
    // cin >> _;
    while (_--)
        solve();
    return 0;
}to be update

docs.title: A
docs.text:
因为只会走n+m-1补,所以只需要维护一个数的数量

再加上滚动数组优化dp即可

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define endl '\n'
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
const int N = 5e2 + 10;
const ll mod = 998244353;
int f[2][N][N * 2]; // i j 0
void solve() {
    int n, m, p, q, u, to;
    cin >> n >> m >> p >> q;
    vector<vector<int>> a(n + 1, vector<int>(m + 1));
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
        for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++)
            cin >> a[i][j];
    if (!a[1][1])
        f[1][1][1] = 1;
    else
        f[1][1][0] = 1;
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        u = i % 2, to = (i + 1) % 2;
        for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++) // clear
            for (int k = 0; k <= n + m - 1; k++)
                f[to][j][k] = 0;

        for (int j = 1; j <= m; j++)
            for (int k = 0; k <= n + m - 1; k++) {
                if (i + 1 <= n)
                    f[to][j][k + !a[i + 1][j]] = (f[to][j][k + !a[i + 1][j]] + f[u][j][k]) % mod;
                if (j + 1 <= m)
                    f[u][j + 1][k + !a[i][j + 1]] = (f[u][j + 1][k + !a[i][j + 1]] + f[u][j][k]) % mod;
            }
    }
    ll ans = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i <= n + m - 1; i++)
        if (i >= p && n + m - 1 - i >= q) {
            ans = (ans + f[n % 2][m][i]) % mod;
        }
    cout << ans << endl;
}
int main() {
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0);
    int _ = 1;
    // cin >> _;
    while (_--)
        solve();
    return 0;
}

docs.title: B
docs.text:
每次贪心的把x/y加入,然后类似求gcd的做法

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define endl '\n'
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
const int N = 1e5 + 100;
void solve() {
    ll x, y, t;
    cin >> x >> y;
    vector<int> ans;
    while (x % y != 0) {
        t = x % y;
        ans.push_back(x / y);
        x = y;
        y = t;
    }
    ans.push_back(x / y);
    cout << (int)ans.size() - 1 << " ";
    for (auto i : ans)
        cout << i << " ";
    cout << endl;
}
int main() {
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0);
    int _ = 1;
    cin >> _;
    while (_--)
        solve();
    return 0;
}

docs.title: F
docs.text:
高精度+dp

先预处理出三个底座的汉诺塔就可以求了

\(f4[i]=min(2*f[i-j]+f3[j])\)

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define endl '\n'
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
typedef pair<int, int> pii;
const int N = 1e4 + 10, M = 170;
const ll mod = 998244353;
const int LEN = 100009;
struct bign {
    vector<short> a;
    int sign;
    bign() : sign(1) {}
    bign(ll num) : sign(1) { *this = num; }
    bign(string &s) : sign(1) {
        for (int i = (int)s.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--)
            a.push_back(s[i] - '0');
    }
    bign &up() {
        while (a.size() > 1 && !a.back())
            a.pop_back(); // 去除前导零
        for (int i = 1; i < a.size(); i++) {
            a[i] += a[i - 1] / 10;
            a[i - 1] %= 10;
        }
        while (a.back() >= 10) {
            a.push_back(a.back() / 10);
            a[(int)a.size() - 2] %= 10;
        }
        return *this;
    }
    bign operator=(const bign T) {
        a = T.a;
        sign = T.sign;
        return *this;
    }
    bign operator=(ll num) {
        sign = num < 0 ? -1 : 1;
        num = abs(num);
        a.clear();
        while (num)
            a.push_back(num % 10), num /= 10;
        return *this;
    }
    bign &operator+=(const bign &T) {
        if (a.size() < T.a.size())
            a.resize(T.a.size());
        for (int i = 0; i < T.a.size(); i++)
            a[i] += T.a[i];
        return this->up();
    }
    bign operator+(const bign &T) const {
        if (this->sign != T.sign) {
            if (this->sign == -1) {
                return T + *this;
            } else {
                return *this - T;
            }
        }
        bign ans;
        ans.sign = T.sign;
        ans.a.resize(max(a.size(), T.a.size()));
        for (int i = 0; i < max(a.size(), T.a.size()); i++) {
            if (i < a.size())
                ans.a[i] += a[i];
            if (i < T.a.size())
                ans.a[i] += T.a[i];
        }
        return ans.up();
    }
    bign operator*(const bign &T) const {
        bign ans;
        ans.a.resize(a.size() + T.a.size());
        for (int i = 0; i < T.a.size(); i++)
            for (int j = 0; j < a.size(); j++)
                ans.a[i + j] += (a[j] * T.a[i]);
        return ans.up();
    }
    bign operator-(const bign &T) const {
        bign ans;
        if (*this < T) {
            ans = T - *this;
            ans.sign = -1;
        } else {
            for (int i = 0, t = 0; i < a.size(); i++) {
                t = a[i] - t;
                if (i < T.a.size())
                    t -= T.a[i];
                ans.a.push_back((t + 10) % 10);
                if (t < 0)
                    t = 1;
                else
                    t = 0;
            }
        }
        return ans.up();
    }
    bign operator/(const bign &T) const {
        ll i, j;
        bign ans = 0, c = *this;
        for (i = (int)a.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
            ans = ans * 10 + a[i];
            for (j = 0; j < 10; j++)
                if (ans < T * (j + 1))
                    break;
            c.a[i] = j;
            ans = ans - T * j;
        }
        return c.up();
    }
    bign operator%(const bign &T) {
        int i, j;
        bign ans = 0;
        for (i = (int)a.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
            ans = ans * 10 + a[i];
            for (j = 0; j < 10; j++)
                if (ans < T * (j + 1))
                    break;
            ans = ans - T * j;
        }
        return ans;
    }
    bool operator<(const bign &T) const {
        if (a.size() != T.a.size())
            return a.size() < T.a.size();
        for (int i = a.size() - 1; i >= 0; --i)
            if (a[i] != T.a[i])
                return a[i] < T.a[i];
        return 0;
    }
    bool operator>(const bign &T) const { return T < *this; }
    bool operator<=(const bign &b) const { return !(b < *this); }
    bool operator>=(const bign &b) const { return !(*this < b); }
    bool operator!=(const bign &b) const { return b < *this || *this < b; }
    bool operator==(const bign &b) const { return !(b < *this) && !(b > *this); }

    bool operator>(bign &T) {
        return T < *this;
    }
    friend istream &operator>>(istream &is, bign &T) {
        string s;
        is >> s;
        T.a.clear();
        if (s[0] == '-')
            T.sign = -1;
        for (int i = (int)s.size() - 1; i >= (T.sign != 1); i--)
            T.a.push_back(s[i] - '0');
        return is;
    }
    friend ostream &operator<<(ostream &os, const bign &T) {
        if (T.sign == -1)
            os << '-';
        for (int i = (int)T.a.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--)
            os << T.a[i];
        return os;
    }
};
bign f4[N], f3[N];
void solve() {
    int n;
    cin >> n;
    cout << f4[n] << endl;
    // bign a, b;
    // cin >> a >> b;
    // cout << min(a, b) << endl;
}
int main() {

    f3[1] = 1;
    for (int i = 2; i <= 200; i++)
        f3[i] = f3[i - 1] * 2 + 1;
    // cout << endl;
    f4[1] = 1;
    bign two = 2;
    for (int i = 2; i <= 1e4; i++) {
        f4[i] = -1;
        for (int j = 1; j <= min(i - 1, 200); j++)
            if (f4[i] == -1)
                f4[i] = two * f4[i - j] + f3[j];
            else
                f4[i] = min(f4[i], two * f4[i - j] + f3[j]);
    }
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0);
    int _ = 1;
    cin >> _;
    while (_--)
        solve();
    return 0;
}

docs.title: G
docs.text:
求能整除区间内数最多的数

也就是求区间出现最多的质因数,一个数最多只有7个,然后问题就转化为了求区间众数,可以利用回滚莫队解决

跑的挺快,并没有出现题解说的卡常情况?

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define endl '\n'
#define x first
#define y second
#define sum(x) (a[x].sum)
#define tag(x) (a[x].t)
#define ls(x) (a[x].l)
#define rs(x) (a[x].r)
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
typedef pair<int, int> pii;
typedef pair<ll, ll> pll;
typedef double db;
const ll mod = 998244353;
const int N = 5e4 + 100, M = 1e6 + 100;
vector<int> pr;
int cnt[M], cnt1[M];
void solve() {
    int n, q;
    cin >> n >> q;
    vector<array<int, 3>> qry(q);
    vector<int> ans(q), l(n + 1), r(n + 1), bel(n + 1, 0);
    const int B = sqrt(q) + 1;

    vector<vector<int>> fac(n + 1);
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        bel[i] = (i - 1) / B + 1;
        fac[i].clear();
        int x;
        cin >> x;
        for (auto p : pr)
            if (x % p == 0) {
                fac[i].push_back(p);
                while (x % p == 0)
                    x /= p;
            }

        if (x > 1)
            fac[i].push_back(x);
    }
    int tot = n / B;
    for (int i = 1; i <= tot; i++) {
        if (i * B > n)
            break;
        l[i] = (i - 1) * B + 1;
        r[i] = i * B;
    }
    if (r[tot] < n)
        tot++, l[tot] = r[tot - 1] + 1, r[tot] = n;
    for (int i = 0; i < q; i++) {
        int l, r;
        cin >> l >> r;
        qry[i] = {l, r, i};
    }
    sort(qry.begin(), qry.end(), [&](array<int, 3> &a, array<int, 3> &b) {
        if (bel[a[0]] != bel[b[0]])
            return bel[a[0]] < bel[b[0]];
        return a[1] < b[1];
    });

    int L = r[bel[qry[0][0]]] + 1;
    int R = r[bel[qry[0][0]]];
    int now = r[bel[qry[0][0]]];
    int res = 0;
    auto add = [&](int x) -> void {
        for (auto p : fac[x])
            cnt[p]++, res = max(res, cnt[p]);
    };
    auto del = [&](int x) -> void {
        for (auto p : fac[x])
            cnt[p]--;
    };
    for (int i = 0; i < q; i++) {

        if (bel[qry[i][0]] == bel[qry[i][1]]) // 询问在同一块内,暴力求解
        {
            int tmp = 0;
            for (int j = qry[i][0]; j <= qry[i][1]; j++)
                for (auto p : fac[j])
                    cnt1[p]++, tmp = max(tmp, cnt1[p]);

            ans[qry[i][2]] = tmp;
            for (int j = qry[i][0]; j <= qry[i][1]; j++)
                for (auto p : fac[j])
                    cnt1[p]--;
            continue;
        }
        if (now ^ bel[qry[i][0]]) // 需要更新,新的块
        {
            // L=r[bel[qry[i][0]]] + 1  R=r[bel[qry[i][0]]]
            while (R > r[bel[qry[i][0]]])
                del(R), R--;
            while (L < r[bel[qry[i][0]]] + 1)
                del(L), L++;
            res = 0, now = bel[qry[i][0]];
        }
        while (R < qry[i][1])
            add(++R);
        int tmp = res, l1 = L;
        while (l1 > qry[i][0])
            add(--l1);
        ans[qry[i][2]] = res;
        while (l1 < L)
            del(l1), l1++;
        res = tmp;
    }
    for (auto i : ans)
        cout << i << endl;
    while (L <= R)
        del(L), L++;
}
int main() {
    auto getpr = [&](int n) -> void {
        vector<bool> notpr(n + 10);
        for (int i = 2; i <= n; i++) {
            if (!notpr[i])
                pr.push_back(i);
            for (auto p : pr) {
                if (i * p > n)
                    break;
                notpr[i * p] = 1;
                if (i % p == 0)
                    break;
            }
        }
    };
    getpr(1e3);
    cout << setiosflags(ios::fixed) << setprecision(10);
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0);
    int _ = 1;
    cin >> _;
    while (_--)
        solve();
    return 0;
}

docs.title: H
docs.text:
神秘结论

1.如果A第一轮扣血扣死,B赢

2.B第一轮被打死或只剩一点,A赢

3.其他情况B赢,无论A怎么操作,B操作完后,A一定和B血量一样

#include <bits/stdc++.h>

}

docs.title: J
docs.text:
二分答案

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define endl '\n'
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
typedef pair<int, int> pii;
const int N = 5e2 + 10;
const ll mod = 998244353;
void solve() {
    int n, k;
    cin >> n >> k;
    vector<int> a(n + 1);
    vector<int> vis(n + 1);
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++)
        cin >> a[i];
    auto chk = [&](int x) -> bool {
        set<pii> s;
        map<int, int> mp;
        int ok = 0;
        for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
            int req = a[i];
            if (s.find({mp[req], req}) != s.end()) {
                s.erase({mp[req], req});
                mp[req] = i;
                s.insert({mp[req], req});
                ok++;
            } else {
                if (s.size() < x)
                    mp[req] = i, s.insert({mp[req], req});
                else {
                    auto t = s.begin();
                    s.erase(t);
                    mp[req] = i, s.insert({mp[req], req});
                }
            }
        }
        return ok >= k;
    };
    int l = 1, r = n;
    while (l < r) {
        int mid = l + r >> 1;
        if (chk(mid))
            r = mid;
        else
            l = mid + 1;
    }
    if (chk(l))
        cout << l << endl;
    else
        cout << "cbddl" << endl;
}
int main() {
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0);
    int _ = 1;
    // cin >> _;
    while (_--)
        solve();
    return 0;
}

docs.title: K
docs.text:
#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define endl '\n'
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
void solve() {
    ll n, m;
    cin >> n >> m;
    ll ans = 0;
    for (ll i = 1; i <= n; i++)
        ans += i * i * m;
    cout << ans << endl;
}
int main() {
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0);
    int _ = 1;
    cin >> _;
    while (_--)
        solve();
    return 0;
}

docs.title: L
docs.text:
注意到只与x有关,差分前缀和即可

#include <bits/stdc++.h>
#define endl '\n'
using namespace std;
typedef long long ll;
const int N = 1e5 + 100;
void solve() {
    int n;
    cin >> n;
    vector<int> s(N, 0);
    for (int i = 1; i <= n; i++) {
        int x1, y1, x2, y2;

        cin >> x1 >> y1 >> x2 >> y2;
        s[x1]++, s[x2]--;
    }
    int ans = 0;
    for (int i = 1; i <= 1e5; i++) {
        s[i] += s[i - 1];
        if (s[i])
            ans++;
    }
    cout << ans << endl;
}
int main() {
    ios::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(0), cout.tie(0);
    int _ = 1;
    // cin >> _;
    while (_--)
        solve();
    return 0;
}
